review: Wow how to Start.... from my point of view this Movie is a treasure.. rap in movies is offen really embarrasing, not here. for me it was heartwarming and a must see please give this Movie a chance you will not regret it !

title: In Love :)
review: OK first of all i had no idea who and what Cyrano de Bergerac is so i had no expectations at all. And i am totally in love with this movie! Just take it as what it is, a heartwarming love story - perfect for when youre just in a mood for that kind of thing â™¥

title: A gem, a tearjerker, a legal dose of happiness
review:
Some movies can be cheesy, the story can have flaws and even have two-dimensional characters and get away with all the mistakes.
Sorry for you if you don't speak german, this gem can't be dubbed, it's a celebration of the beauty of words.
If you're searching for 100 minutes of fun and a dose of pure joy and happiness, watch this movie. But don't forget the tissue box!
